LanguageData.AdrenalineHigh.label: high on adrenaline
LanguageData.AdrenalineHigh.description: Bursts of chemicals are coursing in the bloodstream. Eliminating all pain, reduce bleeding, and increase movement and healing speed.
LanguageData.ArmorBaneDamage.label: armor bane
LanguageData.BladeHeartDicipline.label: blade heart
LanguageData.BladeHeartDicipline.description: A powerful condition that allows a carrier to inflict aura damage, while having the chance to inflict armor bane when hitting the armor.
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.label: chi corruption
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.description: A vile energy that can take hold of any sentient beings, be it humanoids or machines, where it can slowly weaken them and slowly inflict damage over time. All of this was possible by allowing the corrupted chi to rampage violently inside the target without regards of their well being.
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.stages.major.label: major
LanguageData.ChiCorruption.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.CorrosiveAcid.label: corrosive acid
LanguageData.CorrosiveAcid.description: A lethal solution that slowly eats away at any target, while lowering their move speed and manipulation over time.
LanguageData.CorrosiveAcid.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.CorrosiveAcid.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.CorrosiveAcid.stages.major.label: major
LanguageData.CorrosiveDamage.label: corrosive damage
LanguageData.CorrosiveDamage.description: A severe injury caused by corrosive acid.
LanguageData.CorruptChi.label: corrupt chi
LanguageData.CorruptChi.description: A severe injury caused by corrupted chi.
LanguageData.CrowFeatheredHood.label: Crow Feathered Hood
LanguageData.CrowFeatheredHood.description: Some effects after wearing a crow feathered hood.
LanguageData.DarkConstitution.label: dark constitution
LanguageData.DarkConstitution.description: A natural condition only present from hunterphages.
LanguageData.FireArmorBane.label: heat armor down
LanguageData.HyperRegenerative.label: hyper-regenerative
LanguageData.HyperRegenerative.description: An innate ability that regenerates wounds incredibly fast.
LanguageData.InstantDeath.label: Instant kill
LanguageData.PhantomHood.label: Phantom Hood
LanguageData.PhantomHood.description: Some effects after wearing a phantom hood.
LanguageData.PhantomOfDeath.label: phantom of death
LanguageData.PhantomOfDeath.description: A powerful aura containing the essence of death.
LanguageData.RogueHood.label: Rogue Hood
LanguageData.RogueHood.description: Some effects after wearing a rogue hood.
LanguageData.ShadowCloakz.label: shadow walker cloak
LanguageData.ShadowCloakz.description: A technique that renders the user invisible, all while boosting melee damage significantly.
LanguageData.ShadowGuards.label: Shadow Guards
LanguageData.ShadowGuards.description: Some effects after wearing a pair of shadow guards.
LanguageData.ShadowStubs.label: Shadow Stubs
LanguageData.ShadowStubs.description: Some effects after wearing a pair of shadow stubs.
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerCoat.label: Shadow Walker Coat
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerCoat.description: Some effects after wearing a shadow walker coat.
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerFeatheredCoat.label: Shadow Walker Feathered Coat
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerFeatheredCoat.description: Some effects after wearing a shadow walker feathered coat.
LanguageData.Socialize.label: socialize

LanguageData.StakeDriverGloves.description: Some effects after wearing a pair of stake driver gloves.
LanguageData.WitheringDamage.label: wither
